text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
In Fukushima, there is a rehabilitation 
center for injured Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
The hot springs there are famous, and 
everyone who has been there says they're 
really relaxing and feel great.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and they also provide these cute
ear covers as amenities. I've seen them
before, and they had hot spring marks on
them. They're really adorable♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
I'm thinking about visiting the place
and checking it out for myself. I have
a feeling that there's a lot more to
learn and discover there besides the
hot springs♪
